4. You should wait to add more volume just after add volume, by building AWS EC2.

Since Elastic Block Store(EBS) storage supports optimized storage, users canâ€™t extend storage volume two times in a row.

Unfortunately, at the first time, I didnâ€™t know it (again ðŸ‘») and when VM lacked volume, I doubled dist capacity (76*2) at a rough but It needs more.
